name: Ball Rush (VAAR Games)
description:
The game is an endless adventure of a ball, where you have to escape the spikes that come along the way and not to get hit by the Spikes that seal you on either sides. The ultimate goal of the game is to set a high score. On the way, never miss to collect the coins which can be used in the shop to buy new balls. Also Collect the lives to get an extra life. At start, you will be given with 2 lives. And you can catch upto maximum of 4 lives. Some balls gives you 3 lives at start and some the ability to catch upto maximum of 5 lives.

Features:
~Shop is available. Use the coins you collected to buy new balls.
~Has 10 different balls
~The last five balls unlocks you some special powers which can be used during game play.
~Unlock the "GOLDEN BALL" and get the benefit of all the special powers available.

Controls:
~Touch and hold the left side of the screen to move the player left.
~Touch and hold the right side of the screen to move the player right.
